title: Multi-agent audit of ralphtools v1.4 implementation
description: Run critique-waves with specialized parallel agents. READ docs.local/audit-research/ first for methodology AND tech stack context. USE Context7 MCP to look up zsh/jq best practices during audit.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Read docs.local/audit-research/*.md for methodology + tech stack
Use Context7 MCP to verify zsh best practices
Create docs.local/audit-v1.4/ with instructions.md and tracker.md
Run static analysis first: zsh -n ralph.zsh, shellcheck if available
Agent 1 (Security): Check for command injection, unsafe evals, hardcoded secrets
Agent 2 (Style): Verify local vars, zsh syntax (not bash), function naming
Agent 3 (Coverage): Verify all new functions have tests in test-ralph.zsh
Use Validator pattern: verify findings respect control-flow ordering
Capture full audit trail with timestamps in tracker.md
